author: I-allu-I
post_text: August 7, 2017 at 6:58 PM#1Hi MA-users,Is there way to label multiple objects with same text in one macro line?I.e Label Timecode 5 + Page 5 + Macro 5 + Executor 5.15 (Song name?)I know this example is not working correctly but hope so you get the idea.-Alex

posts.author: I-allu-I
posts.post_text: August 7, 2017 at 6:58 PM#1Hi MA-users,Is there way to label multiple objects with same text in one macro line?I.e Label Timecode 5 + Page 5 + Macro 5 + Executor 5.15 (Song name?)I know this example is not working correctly but hope so you get the idea.-Alex

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: August 7, 2017 at 7:02 PM#2Setvar $songname = ("Enter Song Name")Label Timecode 5 $"songname"Label Page 5 $"songname"Label Macro 5 $"songname"Label Exec 5.15 $"songname"

posts.author: I-allu-I
posts.post_text: August 7, 2017 at 7:17 PM#3Thank you Ryan for really fast answer!-Alex

title: Multiple label macro
